question.data: Where can I purchase the E-Summit merchandise?
question.answer: You can purchase the E-SUMMIT merchandise, customised specially for the theme of E-Summit 2023 from the MERCH SECTION of our website itself.

question.data: How can I participate in E-Summit competitions?
question.answer: We have listed all our competitions on UNSTOP,where you can register.

question.data: Is there any registration fees for attending esummit IIT Indore?
question.answer: Yes there is a registration fees to cover's the event or you can check to the website.

question.data: .Can only IIT Indore students participate in esummit?
question.answer: No, anyone can attend this event , it's open for all whether you are student of iit indore or not but the only thing is that you have interest in it .

question.data: What kind of events or competition will  take place in esummit?
question.answer: Esummit IIT Indore includes Speeches by renowned entrepreneurs, panel discussion, workshops,pitch competition, startup showcases.

question.data: How can I stay updated about esummit- IIT Indore?
question.answer: You can follow our official website or social media handles to get information about esummit. We regularly post about the events, speakers or sessions.

question.data: Can I participate in competitions individually or participating in teams is compulsory ?
question.answer: We have variety of competitions, individual as well as team. You can participate in any of them as per your convenience.

question.data: Will there be accomodation facilities during the summit?

question.answer: Yes we have online as well as offline competitions lined up this year.

question.data: Can I be a part of the summit's team?
question.answer: Yes, you can become a campus ambassador of our summit and get a profound experience throughout the summit.

question.data: How to collaborate with E-Cell IIT Indore?
question.answer: You can reach out to our Outreach Team whose details are mentioned on our website.
